WeddingInvite.INVITATION_HEADING: We'd love for you to join us
WeddingInvite.INVITATION_BODY:
After all we've shared and built together,

we're ready to begin the next chapter.
WeddingInvite.COUNTDOWN_HEADER: Chris & Scarlett's wedding is in {days} days!
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_PUBLIC_DESC: We will provide a shuttle bus from Jeungsan Station departing at 12:00. The exact boarding location will be announced later and may change depending on circumstances.
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_PUBLIC_LINK: View Jeungsan Station on Kakao Map →
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_PUBLIC_NAVER: View Jeungsan Station on Naver Map →
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_PUBLIC_GOOGLE: View Jeungsan Station on Google Maps →
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_DRIVING_DESC: If you're driving, you can use the Kakao Map link below for directions to the wedding venue. Navigation address: 631-2 Hwaje-ri, Wondong-myeon, Yangsan-si, Gyeongsangnam-do
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_DRIVING_PARKING: Parking is available in the open spaces around the hanok.
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_TAXI_DESC: You can order a taxi to the venue through K.Ride (formerly Kakao Taxi).
WeddingInvite.TRANSPORT_NOTE: Note: We recommend using Naver or Kakao Map for navigation as Google Maps can be unreliable in Korea
WeddingInvite.CONTACT_DESC:
Feel free to contact us

if there is something you are wondering!
WeddingInvite.INFO_ARRIVAL_NOTICE: Please arrive by 12:00. Seating is assigned, so kindly find your name on the seating chart upon arrival.
WeddingInvite.INFO_DRESSCODE_DESC: The wedding will be held outdoors, so please dress appropriately for the weather. The dress code is formal wedding attire or traditional Korean outfit. Wear shoes suitable for grass, low heels recommended.
WeddingInvite.INFO_DRESSCODE_LINK: Learn more about traditional Korean clothing options →
WeddingInvite.INFO_FOOD_DESC: Welcome drinks will be served from 12:00 at the venue entrance. A buffet catering will begin at 13:30 after the ceremony at the same location, Hanok Hwaje. Vegetarian option or allergy menus are available upon advance request. Please mention in your RSVP.
WeddingInvite.INFO_PARKING_DESC: Parking is available in the open spaces around the Hanok.
WeddingInvite.RSVP_SECTION_SUB:
We would be honored to have you celebrate with us.

Please let us know if you can attend.
WeddingInvite.RSVP_CONTACT_INFO: Please provide at least one contact method (email or phone) so we can send you updates about the wedding.
WeddingInvite.RSVP_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your RSVP has been successfully submitted. We're so excited to celebrate with you!
WeddingInvite.RSVP_CALENDAR_PROMPT: Would you like to add our wedding to your calendar?
WeddingInvite.RSVP_EMAIL_CHECK_PROMPT: To check if you've already submitted an RSVP, please enter your email address. You can also skip this step.
WeddingInvite.RSVP_EXISTING_FOUND: You have already sent an RSVP as {name}.
WeddingInvite.RSVP_UPDATE_QUESTION: Would you like to update it?
WeddingInvite.RSVP_UPDATE_YES: Yes, I would like to update my RSVP
WeddingInvite.RSVP_CHANGE_PROMPT_MESSAGE: We have your previous RSVP below. Would you like to change it?
WeddingInvite.ACCOUNTS_INTRO_TEXT:
Since we're in Korea, bringing gifts is difficult.

If you prefer, a contribution toward our Honeymoon

in Antarctica would mean a lot to us.
WeddingInvite.OUTRO_CAPTION: Thank you all for your support. We will live happily together.
